CMR-DE ( cardiac MR delay contrast enhancement ) evaluate scar heart muscle follow heart attack . Subjects inject contrast medication make scar visible present . DOC.criteria: Males females 21 year age old Healthy volunteer subject prior history heart attack prior CMRDE image . Women pregnant Subjects GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 Subjects ICD Subjects coronary stent incompatible 3T
